General.Name: E&R Engineering
General.Description: E&R Engineering Corporation provides automation machines for semiconductor, LED, passive component, material, and medical industries in Taiwan. The company offers laser solutions, including wafer and package marking; and micromaching, such as laser drilling, cutting, scribing, and grooving solution. It also provides plasma technology products comprising wafer and panel forms, and L/F substrates; FPC equipment that consists of RTR, STS, lamination, punch, plating, and open cover machines; and embossed carrier tape, cover tape, and reel products. The company also provides workshop and laser process development services. E&R Engineering Corporation founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.
